sections.heading: Repealed.Section 76-22-2 - Repealed
sections.text:
History:Laws 1990, ch. 122, § 1; 1993, ch. 330, § 1; repealed by Laws 2011, ch. 29, § 7.

Repeals.— Laws 2011, ch. 29, § 7 repealed 76-22-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1990, ch. 122, § 1, relating to the short title of the former Organic Commodities Act, effective July 1, 2011. For provisions of former section,seethe 2010 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
